description: Ready in 15 minutes, this easy wonton noodle soup recipe uses ready-made wontons for a fuss-free meal to beat the midweek dinner rush.
name: Best Wonton Noodle Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add stock and soy, then bring to the boil. Add broccoli and cook for 1 minute or until just tender. Remove and discard star anise. Ladle broth mixture over noodles and wontons. Serve topped with onion and chilli.
